Types

Alloc = proc (ud, theptr: pointer; osize, nsize: cint) {.cdecl.}
Source   Edit   
Buffer {.final.} = object
  p*: cstring
  lvl*: cint
  L*: PState
  buffer*: array[BufferSize, char]

LuaType {.size: 4.} = enum
  TInvalid = 0, TNone = 1, TNil = 2, TBoolean = 3, TLightUserData = 4,
  TNumber = 5, TString = 6, TTable = 7, TFunction = 8, TUserData = 9,
  TThread = 10
Source   Edit   
Number = float

PState = pointer

Reader = proc (L: PState; ud: pointer; sz: ptr cint): cstring {.cdecl.}

TDebug {.final.} = object
  event*: cint
  name*: cstring
  namewhat*: cstring
  what*: cstring
  source*: cstring
  currentline*: cint
  nups*: cint
  linedefined*: cint
  lastlinedefined*: cint
  short_src*: array[IdSize, char]
  i_ci*: cint
Source   Edit   
ThreadStatus {.size: 4.} = enum
  ThreadOk = (0, "ok"), constYield = (1, "yield"), ErrRun = (2, "run error"),
  ErrSyntax = (3, "syntax error"), ErrMem = (4, "memory error"),
  ErrErr = (5, "error")
Source   Edit   
Treg {.final.} = object
  name*: cstring
  `func`*: CFunction
Source   Edit   
Writer = proc (L: PState; p: pointer; sz: cint; ud: pointer): cint {.cdecl.}
